title: Seven SEALS: Murder In Paradise
description: A retired Navy SEAL is unjustly convicted of murder and sentenced to life behind bars. Blake Franklin is called to search an island paradise for the real killer. The island judicial system, decades of bitterness, and a sophisticated organization stand between Blake and the truth, If he fails, the island paradise becomes Hell on earth for a patriot. SEALS will leave no man behind, and Blake Franklin is used to having no easy days. When Blake Franklin needs support, he calls in Seven SEALS in this gripping story of murder and injustice in the tropics.
author: Ryan   Hale
